languages.text: "Золото трона! Я же почти, почти разгадала, как этот ашмаг командует крысенышем! И все-таки что-то упустила. Ритм не тот? Слишком тихо пела? Хм..." {n}Торговка кидает парню монету и виновато пожимает плечами.{/n} "Простите, шерин. Бывают дни, когда удача просто поворачивается к тебе жо.. ягодицами".

"Throne's gold! I was this close to figuring out how that ashmag makes his ratling dance to his tune! I must have missed something. Was my rhythm off? Was I singing too quietly? Hmm..." {n}She tosses a coin to the flute player and shrugs awkwardly.{/n} "A thousand apologies, shereen. I guess today is one of those days when luck just decides to show you its ar— backside."

Хм..." {n}Торговка кидает парню монету и виновато пожимает плечами.{/n} "Простите, шерин. Бывают дни, когда удача просто поворачивается к тебе жо.. ягодицами".

Hmm..." {n}She tosses a coin to the flute player and shrugs awkwardly.{/n} "A thousand apologies, shereen. I guess today is one of those days when luck just decides to show you its ar— backside."

languages.text: « Par le Trône d'Or ! J'étais à deux doigts de découvrir comment cet ashmag faisait danser son rat ! J'ai dû rater quelque chose. Je n'avais peut-être pas le bon rythme. Ou alors, je ne chantais peut-être pas assez fort ? Hmm... » {n}Elle jette une pièce au joueur de flûte et hausse les épaules.{/n} « Mille excuses, shereen. Il y a des jours comme ça où la chance a clairement décidé de vous montrer son c... ahem, son arrière-train. »
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold! I was this close to figuring out how that ashmag makes his ratling dance to his tune! I must have missed something. Was my rhythm off? Was I singing too quietly? Hmm..." {n}She tosses a coin to the flute player and shrugs awkwardly.{/n} "A thousand apologies, shereen. I guess today is one of those days when luck just decides to show you its ar— backside."

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône d'Or ! J'étais à deux doigts de découvrir comment cet ashmag faisait danser son rat ! J'ai dû rater quelque chose. Je n'avais peut-être pas le bon rythme. Ou alors, je ne chantais peut-être pas assez fort ? Hmm... » {n}Elle jette une pièce au joueur de flûte et hausse les épaules.{/n} « Mille excuses, shereen. Il y a des jours comme ça où la chance a clairement décidé de vous montrer son c... ahem, son arrière-train. »

languages.text: «¡Por el Trono dorado! ¡Estaba así de cerca de averiguar cómo hace ese ashmag para que su roedor baile al son de su melodía! Debo de haber pasado algo por alto. ¿Estaba tocando el ritmo equivocado? ¿Quizá cantaba demasiado bajo? Hum...». {n}Arroja una moneda al flautista y se encoge de hombros avergonzada.{/n} «Mil disculpas, shereen. Supongo que hoy es uno de esos días en que la suerte decide darte por... darte la espalda».
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold! I was this close to figuring out how that ashmag makes his ratling dance to his tune! I must have missed something. Was my rhythm off? Was I singing too quietly? Hmm..." {n}She tosses a coin to the flute player and shrugs awkwardly.{/n} "A thousand apologies, shereen. I guess today is one of those days when luck just decides to show you its ar— backside."

Debo de haber pasado algo por alto. ¿Estaba tocando el ritmo equivocado? ¿Quizá cantaba demasiado bajo? Hum...». {n}Arroja una moneda al flautista y se encoge de hombros avergonzada.{/n} «Mil disculpas, shereen. Supongo que hoy es uno de esos días en que la suerte decide darte por... darte la espalda».

languages.text: 「王座の金塊だよ！このアッシュマグがどうやって曲に合わせてラットリングを踊らせているか、もう少しで分かるところだった！何かを見落としているんだね。リズムに乗れてなかった？歌声が小さすぎ？うーん…」{n}彼女はフルート吹きにコインを投げて、バツが悪そうに肩をすくめる。{/n}「本当にごめんよ、シェリーン。今日は運に見放された1日だったようだね…」
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold! I was this close to figuring out how that ashmag makes his ratling dance to his tune! I must have missed something. Was my rhythm off? Was I singing too quietly? Hmm..." {n}She tosses a coin to the flute player and shrugs awkwardly.{/n} "A thousand apologies, shereen. I guess today is one of those days when luck just decides to show you its ar— backside."

traits.locale_text: 「王座の金塊だよ！このアッシュマグがどうやって曲に合わせてラットリングを踊らせているか、もう少しで分かるところだった！何かを見落としているんだね。リズムに乗れてなかった？歌声が小さすぎ？うーん…」{n}彼女はフルート吹きにコインを投げて、バツが悪そうに肩をすくめる。{/n}「本当にごめんよ、シャリーン。今日は運に見放された1日だったようだね…」

languages.text: “黄金王座在上！我差一点就弄清楚那个坏种到底是怎么指挥那只老鼠的了！我肯定是漏掉了什么，是我的节奏错了吗？还是我的歌声太轻了？嗯……”{n}她朝吹笛人扔了一枚王座币，尴尬地耸了耸肩。{/n}“真是万分抱歉，亲爱的。我猜，今天的运气可能就是挺操——挺不顺的吧。”
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold! I was this close to figuring out how that ashmag makes his ratling dance to his tune! I must have missed something. Was my rhythm off? Was I singing too quietly? Hmm..." {n}She tosses a coin to the flute player and shrugs awkwardly.{/n} "A thousand apologies, shereen. I guess today is one of those days when luck just decides to show you its ar— backside."

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上！我差一点就弄清楚那个坏种到底是怎么指挥那只老鼠的了！我肯定是漏掉了什么，是我的节奏错了吗？还是我的歌声太轻了？嗯……”{n}她朝吹笛人扔了一枚王座币，尴尬地耸了耸肩。{/n}“真是万分抱歉，亲爱的。我猜，今天的运气可能就是挺操——挺不顺的吧。”

languages.text: "Beim Gold des Throns! Ich stand kurz davor, herauszufinden, wie dieser Ashmag seinen Rattling dazu bringt, nach seiner Melodie zu tanzen! Etwas muss mir entgangen sein. War mein Rhythmus falsch? Habe ich zu leise gesungen? Hmm ..." {n}Sie wirft dem Flötenspieler eine Münze zu und zuckt hilflos mit der Schulter.{/n} "Ich bitte tausendmal um Verzeihung, Shereen. Heute ist wohl einer dieser Tage, an denen das Glück einfach beschließt, Euch seinen Hint... seine Kehrseite zu zeigen."
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold! I was this close to figuring out how that ashmag makes his ratling dance to his tune! I must have missed something. Was my rhythm off? Was I singing too quietly? Hmm..." {n}She tosses a coin to the flute player and shrugs awkwardly.{/n} "A thousand apologies, shereen. I guess today is one of those days when luck just decides to show you its ar— backside."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Gold des Throns! Ich stand kurz davor, herauszufinden, wie dieser Ashmag seinen Rattling dazu bringt, nach seiner Melodie zu tanzen! Etwas muss mir entgangen sein. War mein Rhythmus falsch? Habe ich zu leise gesungen? Hmm ..." {n}Sie wirft dem Flötenspieler eine Münze zu und zuckt hilflos mit der Schulter.{/n} "Ich bitte tausendmal um Verzeihung, Shereen. Heute ist wohl einer dieser Tage, an denen das Glück einfach beschließt, Euch seinen Hint... seine Kehrseite zu zeigen."

languages.text: "Tahtın altını adına! Şu külboğazın melodiye uyum sağlamayı fareciğine nasıl öğrettiğini çözmeye çok yakındım! Bir şeyleri gözden kaçırmış olmalıyım. Ritim mi uymadı? Çok mu alçak sesle mırıldandım? Hımm..." {n}Flütçüye bir sikke atarak tuhaf bir şekilde omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Binlerce kez özür dilerim şirinim. Galiba şansın yüzüme güldüğü değil de g... Sırtımdan bıçakladığı günlerden biri bu."
languages.original_text: "Throne's gold! I was this close to figuring out how that ashmag makes his ratling dance to his tune! I must have missed something. Was my rhythm off? Was I singing too quietly? Hmm..." {n}She tosses a coin to the flute player and shrugs awkwardly.{/n} "A thousand apologies, shereen. I guess today is one of those days when luck just decides to show you its ar— backside."
